Tip of the Day
Attributes involving a percent symbol % are multiplicative (For Example: +10% Fine material finding gives 1.1/100).

Beach of Woes

From Walkscape Walkthrough

Namespaces

  • Page
  • Discussion

More

  • More

Page actions

  • Read
  • View source
  • History
  • Purge
Other languages:
  • English

The rocky beach is blanketed in snow. Cold waves crash against the coast, creating a soothing sound. The salty breeze adds an invigorating touch.

Beach of Woes is a location that can be found in the Jarvonia region.

Faction

Beach of Woes is a member of the following factions:

Herbert's Guiding Grounds

Activities

The following activities always available at this location.

Sandcastle building
Sea fishing (Net)
Seashell searching

Routes

The following routes are available at this location.

  Disenchanted Forest 
160 Base Steps
 Beach of Woes 
  Pit of Pittance 
160 Base Steps

Trivia
